column5: Hey Guys!  Most know that I shoot and Edit for the Facts of Fishing but something I love doing is shooting underwater footage for the show and various promo's.  Check out this smallie footage from this summer!  http://www.factsoffishing.com/video/facts-of-fishing-bass-reaction-to-sound/  Happy Halloween!  Ryan
I think I'm glad I don't have speakers at work, LOL
I was like..dam you got me...good post
hahah Nice try.... but I've learned that any time an internet video asks you to "turn up your speakers" or " pay close attention" .... usually will follow with me changing my under wear !!!
got me you...EDIT: Can't post that on family forum so removed"........
Nice one Ryan Im just glad there were no minnow buckets used when making the viedo
yeah great but I didn't get to see how the smallmouth reacted
